Aleph API¶

This module is used to read and export metadata about epublications to/from Aleph. Module is developed as part of the E-Deposit project.

  • aleph package
    • Query workflow
      • AMQP query
      • Count requests
      • Direct queries
      • Diagrams
      • API
    • Submodules
      • Aleph lowlevel API
      • Marc XML / Marc OAI parser
      • ISBN validation module
      • Export module
      • Settings and configuration
      • Data structures

Aleph API description¶

  • Propojeni do katalogu NK ČR
    • Kódy pro polí pro vyhledávání
    • Průběh celé session
